waypoints.onload:
include ("../../includes/afterCrash.lua")
questNPC = 120577 questID = 425495 player.free_counter1 = UMMD_chooseClass (68, 'which class to accept quest?') player.free_counter2 = UMMD_chooseClass (61, 'which class to complete quest?')
function swapClasses (class1, class2, useHomeRune, npc) if player.Class1 ~= class1 then -- swap classes if useHomeRune==true and getZoneId ()~=400 then inventory:useItem (202435) waitForLoadingScreen () end if getZoneId ()==400 then player:target_NPC (110758) RoMScript ('ChoiceListDialogOption (1)') yrest (750) else player:target_NPC (npc) RoMScript ('ChoiceOption (3)') yrest (750) end RoMScript ('ExchangeClass ('..(class1+1)..', '..(class2+1)..')') yrest (2000) player:update () end if getZoneId()==400 then -- leaving home player:target_NPC (110758) RoMScript ('ChoiceListDialogOption (0)') waitForLoadingScreen () end end
function isFirstClass () player:update () return (player.Class1 == player.free_counter1) end
function isSecondClass () player:update () return (player.Class1 == player.free_counter2) end
function activate () if inventory:itemTotalCount (241196)>0 then inventory:useItem(241196) end end
player:mount()
waypoints.waypoint:
if getQuestStatus (questID) == "complete" then if not isSecondClass () then swapClasses (player.free_counter2, player.free_counter1, true) end player:target_NPC (questNPC) CompleteQuestByName (questID) yrest (750) end
local dqCount, dqTotal = RoMScript ('Daily_count ()') if dqCount>=dqTotal then if inventory:itemTotalCount (202434)>0 then inventory:useItem (202434) else print ('\a\ano more tq cards left') error ('') end end
if getQuestStatus (questID)=="not accepted" then if not isFirstClass () then swapClasses (player.free_counter1, player.free_counter2, true) end player:target_NPC (questNPC) AcceptQuestByName (questID) yrest (750) end
if not player.Mounted then player:mount () end
